title: [GAMEPLAY] Omega Squad Teemo's Mushroom Icon Visual Bug
body: It is a visual bug to Omega Squad Teemo's mushroom icon. When placed, if you click on a mushroom, it's icon is a solid color, blue to be exact.

replies.body:
Hey TheAnxiousGnome,

Thanks for reporting this! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
